description:
Explore the very first game that started one of the biggest fighting game franchises - released on its 20th anniversary! 

Discover where one of the best and mechanically richest fighting games descends from - at home and on the go on Nintendo Switch!

Enjoy a hardrock soundtrack and an epic anime story that has fascinated fans for two decades!
The first of the gorgeous 2D sprites games of the franchise, with incredible mechanics!
name: GUILTY GEAR
intro: Discover where one of the best and mechanically richest fighting games descends from - at home and on the go on Nintendo Switchâ„¢!
